original_text: “Therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Since you have forgotten me and turned your back on me, you must bear the consequences of your lewdness and prostitution.”
korean_text: 그러므로 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 네가 나를 잊었고 또 나를 네 등 뒤에 버렸은즉 너는 네 음란과 네 음행의 죄를 담당할지니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says:
and turned your back on me,
you must bear the consequences of your lewdness
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 너희 음란함의 결과를 감당해야 한다
